item.description:
Weather permitting... this place has a GREAT, large deck right on the beach in Salisbury.  Every Sunday they have a big outdoor Reggae party.  $10 cover from 4pm - 8pm.  It's a great place to hang out, dance, drink, eat and catch some rays - then it's beautiful there in the evening too!

Here is a link: http://www.northshorepavilion.com/surfside5...

 

I strongly suggest getting there before 4pm to avoid a line wait, come out and have fun just bring your smiling face and dancing feet because you will be dancing this band ROCKS!!!!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Happy June 5-Surfside 5 Beach D.eck overlooking the ocean with Reggae Band!
